frame.title: Jobs on Legacy Runtime
frame.description: Jobs running on DBR < 15 that should be migrated

datasets.name: ds_legacy_count
datasets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT j.job_id) AS count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_cluster c ON j.cluster_id = c.cluster_id AND c.is_current = TRUE WHERE j.is_current = TRUE AND CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(COALESCE(c.dbr_version, '15'), '^(\\d+)', 1) AS INT) < 15

datasets.name: ds_serverless_adoption
datasets.query: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN product_features_is_serverless THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS serverless_pct FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_usage WHERE usage_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_current_dbr
datasets.query: SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(COALESCE(c.dbr_version, '15'), '^(\\d+)', 1) AS INT) >= 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), '%') AS current_pct FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_cluster c WHERE c.is_current = TRUE

datasets.name: ds_dbr_dist
datasets.query: SELECT REGEXP_EXTRACT(c.dbr_version, '(\\d+\\.\\d+)') AS dbr_version, COUNT(DISTINCT j.job_id) AS job_count, CASE WHEN CAST(SPLIT(REGEXP_EXTRACT(c.dbr_version, '(\\d+\\.\\d+)'), '\\.')[0] AS INT) >= 15 THEN 'Current' WHEN CAST(SPLIT(REGEXP_EXTRACT(c.dbr_version, '(\\d+\\.\\d+)'), '\\.')[0] AS INT) >= 13 THEN 'LTS' ELSE 'Legacy' END AS version_status FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_cluster c ON j.cluster_id = c.cluster_id AND c.is_current = TRUE WHERE j.is_current = TRUE AND c.dbr_version IS NOT NULL GROUP BY REGEXP_EXTRACT(c.dbr_version, '(\\d+\\.\\d+)') ORDER BY dbr_version DESC

datasets.name: ds_compute_type
datasets.query: SELECT CASE WHEN product_features_is_serverless THEN 'Serverless' ELSE 'Classic' END AS compute_type, COUNT(DISTINCT usage_metadata_job_id) AS job_count, ROUND(SUM(list_cost), 2) AS total_cost FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_usage WHERE usage_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS AND usage_metadata_job_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CASE WHEN product_features_is_serverless THEN 'Serverless' ELSE 'Classic' END

datasets.name: ds_legacy_jobs
datasets.query: SELECT j.name AS job_name, w.workspace_name, c.dbr_version, MAX(f.period_end_time) AS last_run FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace w ON j.workspace_id = w.workspace_id AND w.is_current = TRUE LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_cluster c ON j.cluster_id = c.cluster_id AND c.is_current = TRUE LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_job_run_timeline f ON j.job_id = f.job_id AND j.workspace_id = f.workspace_id WHERE j.is_current = TRUE AND CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(COALESCE(c.dbr_version, '15'), '^(\\d+)', 1) AS INT) < 15 AND f.period_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY j.name, w.workspace_name, c.dbr_version ORDER BY last_run DESC LIMIT 30
